data.label: Converted most custom-built tables to AG Grid, significantly enhancing user experience and improving performance by 50%.
Implemented an MQTT-based live notification system for real-time equipment alerts, enabling faster fault detection and reducing accident risks by 40%.
Migrated a large-scale Angular project to Nx monorepo architecture for better scalability, reducing core code dependency and bug rates by 60%.
Worked extensively with RxJS to manage asynchronous data streams, improving application responsiveness and overall maintainability.
Led the integration of the Flourish theme using SCSS, transforming the platformâ€™s UI and improving user engagement, resulting in a 15% reduction in bounce rate.
Developed reusable Angular components such as AG Grid tables, date pickers, custom forms, and charts, reducing development time for other teams by 80%.
Followed Agile methodologies with sprint-based development cycles, ensuring timely delivery, continuous improvement, and close collaboration with cross-functional teams.
Resolved major bugs and reduced SonarQube issues by 80%, leading to higher code quality and better maintainability.
Integrated i18n for multi-language support, accelerating global expansion and driving 50% growth impact.
Utilized key Angular libraries such as ngx-infinite-scroll, google-maps, ngx-monaco-editor, angular-formio, circlon/tree, cytoscape and more to build robust, feature-rich interfaces.
Applied Cypress for end-to-end UI testing, ensuring application reliability and maintaining high-quality releases.
Mentored interns on core front-end concepts, contributing to team growth, effective onboarding, and a culture of knowledge sharing.
